title: Periodic Phenomena - reasoning with a period

content.question: ​The periodic function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has a period of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The function is increasing on the input-value interval <math alttext="open parenthesis 0 , 4 close parenthesis"> <semantics> <mfenced close=")" open="("> <mn>0,4</mn> </mfenced> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math>. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses less than f open parentheses 15 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>15</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses equals f open parentheses 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>1</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="f open parentheses 3 close parentheses equals f open parentheses 15 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>15</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses 1 close parentheses less than f open parentheses 3 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>1</mn></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​<math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses greater than f open parentheses 15 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>15</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because the values are on two different increasing intervals.

​<math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses less than f open parentheses 17 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>17</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="17 minus 9"><semantics><mrow><mn>17</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a multiple of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​<math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses greater than f open parentheses 17 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo>></mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>17</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="17 minus 9"><semantics><mrow><mn>17</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a multiple of <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses less than f open parentheses 15 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>15</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, because <math alttext="f open parentheses 9 close parentheses equals f open parentheses 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>9</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>1</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="f open parentheses 3 close parentheses equals f open parentheses 15 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>15</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses 1 close parentheses less than f open parentheses 3 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>1</mn></mfenced><mo><</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Support conclusions or choices with a logical rationale or appropriate data.
